title: Professional VRShivaji Construction marketing website (services + offerings)

requirements.text: Create a multi-section marketing website for “VRShivaji Construction” that clearly showcases the business, its services, and what it offers, with responsive layouts for mobile/tablet/desktop.

quotes: Create a professional vrshivaji construction website for a business that showcases our services and what we offer.

acceptanceCriteria: Landing experience includes clear business name “VRShivaji Construction” and a concise value proposition in English.
Site is responsive and readable on mobile, tablet, and desktop.
Navigation allows users to reach Services and Contact sections within 1 click.

requirements.text: Implement core website pages/sections in English: Home (hero + highlights), Services (service list with short descriptions), Why Choose Us (differentiators), Projects/Portfolio (example project cards), About (company overview), and Contact (address/phone/email placeholders + inquiry form).

quotes: Create a professional vrshivaji construction website for a business that showcases our services and what we offer.

acceptanceCriteria: Home includes hero, service highlights, and clear calls-to-action (e.g., “Request a Quote”, “View Services”).
Services section/page renders at least 6 services with titles and short descriptions.
Projects/Portfolio displays a grid/list of project cards (can use sample data initially).
Contact section/page includes an inquiry form with fields: Name, Phone, Email, Message.

requirements.text: Add an inquiry submission flow: the Contact form should validate required fields, submit to the backend canister, and show success/error states.

quotes: Create a professional vrshivaji construction website for a business that showcases our services and what we offer.

acceptanceCriteria: Client-side validation blocks submission when Name, Email (or Phone), and Message are empty.
On submit, the frontend calls a backend method to store the inquiry.
UI shows a loading state during submission and a clear success message when stored.
UI shows a clear error message if the backend call fails.

requirements.text: Backend: store contact inquiries in stable memory with timestamp and provide a read method for retrieving inquiries (for future admin use).

quotes: Create a professional vrshivaji construction website for a business that showcases our services and what we offer.

acceptanceCriteria: A backend type exists for an Inquiry containing at least: id, name, email, phone (optional), message, createdAt timestamp.
There is an update method to create/store an inquiry and return the created record or id.
There is a query method to list stored inquiries (can be simple, e.g., most recent first).
Data persists across canister upgrades using stable storage patterns appropriate for Motoko.

requirements.text: Apply a single coherent “professional construction” visual theme across the site (colors, typography, spacing, and components) using a distinctive style that is not blue/purple.
acceptanceCriteria: Theme uses a consistent palette (e.g., charcoal/graphite, warm sand, and safety orange accents) and consistent typography scale.
Buttons, cards, headings, and section spacing feel consistent across all pages/sections.
No default-template look: hero, sections, and cards have deliberate styling and hierarchy.

requirements.text: Add static brand visuals (generated assets) and use them in the UI: a logo and a hero image/illustration suitable for a construction company.

quotes: Create a professional vrshivaji construction website for a business that showcases our services and what we offer.

acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are placed in frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced directly by the frontend.
Header displays the logo with the text “VRShivaji Construction”.
Home hero section displays the hero image with proper responsive behavior (no distortion, reasonable cropping).

constraints: Use English for all user-facing text.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (no additional backend services).
Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (compose them instead).
Do not add third-party authentication; only Internet Identity is allowed if authentication is needed (not required for this request).
nonGoals: Do not implement payments, invoicing, or e-commerce checkout.
Do not implement real-time chat, push notifications, or email/SMS delivery integrations.
Do not build a full admin dashboard (beyond providing a backend list method for inquiries).

required: Construction company wordmark logo, clean geometric style, dark charcoal with safety-orange accent (vrshivaji-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Wide hero banner image/illustration of a modern construction site with subtle gradient overlay, professional and minimal (construction-hero.dim_1600x900.png)

goalsToAdd: Build a professional marketing website for VRShivaji Construction that showcases services and offerings and captures customer inquiries.
preferencesToAdd: All user-facing text should be in English.
Prefer a professional construction visual theme (charcoal/sand/orange), not blue/purple.
